item.title: A Semantic Logger for JVM Languages
item.description: This little library is inspired by the talk Observability in einer Microservice Welt held on Berlin Expert Days 2018 by Andreas Weigel and Jakob Fels. If you prefer to have some semantic to your logging and improve code readability you can use the SemanticLogger and its SemanticLoggerFactory which adds a thin layer around Slf4j. The SemanticLoggerFactory can be used like the Slf4j LoggerFactory to create a new Logger by class, name or a delegateLogger:
